attributes.action: Protect the elderly and vulnerable, but end lockdown restrictions.
attributes.additional_details: Speaking from my own experience, my mental health has plummeted during this time. Being separated from family is incredibly damaging and this simply cannot keep going on. We have no end goal here, we are going around in circles and this is incredibly damaging. I feel the government has forgotten the toll this is taking. This action is not right anymore we cannot go backwards. We need to move forward and accept this isn't right. My comments are also backed by experts urging an end to restrictions
attributes.background: Restrictions are causing major mental health problems and also damaging on treatments for other illnesses. Covid is not the only issue here. The solution is now becoming worse than the problem. This cannot keep going on like this. I urge the government to end restrictions but protect the vulnerable.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
